data.name: Our_partners
data.value: Our partners

data.name: Our_projects
data.value: Our projects

data.name: Services_text1
data.value: Informing about actions, news, events, invitations, work readiness reports

data.name: Services_text2
data.value: Automated distribution from your programs, sites and services with the help of special software protocols of API

data.name: Services_text3
data.value: Checking lists and single numbers for subscriber availability and cleaning databases from irrelevant numbers

data.name: Services_text4
data.value: Sending voice messages in the form of incoming calls to your partners, customers and employees using a special web interface

data.name: Services_text5
data.value: Sending of digital codes for confirmation of certain operations by means of a telephone number in an incoming call

data.name: Services_text6
data.value: Easy collection and replenishment of the subscriber base. Customers will be able to subscribe to and unsubscribe from newsletters

data.name: Services_text7
data.value: Reception and processing of SMS and calls from subscribers to federal numbers

data.name: Services_text8
data.value: Connect a federal virtual number to receive SMS. Such numbers work without the use of SIM cards and are directly transmitted by operators to our service via the Internet

data.name: Services_text9
data.value: Unlike virtual numbers, you can receive messages from Internet services, banks and payment systems that use alphabetic names to send

data.name: Slogan
data.value: Pragmatic IT solutions for your business

data.name: SMS_Dispatching
data.value: SMS Dispatching

data.name: SMS_text1
data.value: Today SMS distribution is one of the most effective tools

data.name: SMS_text2
data.value: SMS advertising provides a high frequency of reading

data.name: SMS_text3
data.value: Affordable cost, which is many times lower than direct marketing

data.name: SMS_text4
data.value: A greater percentage of responses compared to online and other traditional forms of marketing

data.name: SMS_Title
data.value: Why should you order an SMS advertisement today?

data.name: Tab1_text
data.value: One of the most convenient and fastest ways to communicate between you and customers. Speed, targeting, power.

data.name: Tab1_Title
data.value: Sending

data.name: Tab2_text
data.value: Ideal for cases where you want to send SMS not to the base of old clients, but to attract new ones

data.name: Tab2_Title
data.value: Advertising

data.name: Tab3_text
data.value: Carrying out all kinds of actions (find the code on the product, send it via SMS and get a prize). Stimulation of consumer demand.

data.name: Tab3_Title
data.value: Promotions

data.name: Tab4_text
data.value: A service that allows you to receive SMS messages from your customers. Two-way communication channel with your customers.

data.name: Tab4_Title
data.value: Receiving

data.name: Tab5_text
data.value: Add to your sms attachment as a file, brochure, picture, video, coupon or link to the site. Get the advantage of e-mail at no additional cost.

data.name: Tab5_Title
data.value: Attachment

data.name: Text1
data.value: Of course, mobile marketing is one of the most effective channels of communication with customers.

data.name: Text2
data.value: In particular one of its ways is SMS sending. Promotional SMS messages bearing useful information for the recipient are not irritating, provide stable contact with the target audience and provide the widest opportunities for informing customers about special promotions, events and other news of the company.

data.name: Text3
data.value: But the SMS mailing on the contact database has one major drawback with other advertising tools. SMS mailing serves to communicate with regular customers / visitors, but does not attract new customers!

data.name: Text4
data.value: This method is completely analogous to the placement of advertisements on the air of the television and radio channels, and precisely also harmoniously combines the mass character and legality.

data.name: Title1
data.value: Mass mailing
